element:
http://www.xulplanet.com/tutorials/xultu/toolbar.html http://www.xulplanet.com/reference/elemref/ref_toolbargrippy.html The notch on the side of a toolbar which can be used to collapse and expand it. This element is used internally by the toolbar and should only be used directly when modifying its theme.
nsIAccessibleProvider
Returns the accessibility object for the toolbargrippy.
